CREATE PRODUCT magist USING 4326;

// SPATIAL DIMENSIONS

CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION Municipality (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	cMun Integer DISPLAY_STRING
);

CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION District (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	cDis Integer DISPLAY_STRING
) WITH PARENT (
	Municipality 
);

CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION Section (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	cSec Integer DISPLAY_STRING
) WITH PARENT (
	District 
);

CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION Barrio (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	cBarrio Integer DISPLAY_STRING
);


CREATE SPATIAL DIMENSION Voronoi (
	geometry: Geometry
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	magnitude Integer DISPLAY_STRING
);

// CATEGORICAL DIMENSIONS

CREATE CATEGORICAL DIMENSION Magnitud (
	field: magnitud
);

// RANGES

CREATE RANGE MagnitudRange (
    so2 AS "so2",
    co AS "co",
    no AS "no",
    no2 AS "no2",
    pm25 AS "pm25",
    pm10 AS "pm10",
    nox AS "nox",
    co3 AS "co3",
    tol AS "tol",
    ben AS "ben",
    ebe AS "ebe",
    mxy AS "mxy",
    pxy AS "pxy",
    oxy AS "oxy",
    tch AS "tch",
    ch4 AS "ch4",
    nmhc AS "nmhc"
);

// SENSORS

CREATE SENSOR QAObservation (
	interval: 3600,
	geometry: Point
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	direccion String,
	estacion Long,
	fechaAlta DateTime,
	nomTipo String,
	codTipo String, 
	btx Boolean,
	co Boolean,
	no2 Boolean,
	o3 Boolean,
	pm10 Boolean,
	pm25 Boolean,
	shortId Long, 
	so2 Boolean,
	viaClase String,
	viaNombre String,
	viaPar String
) WITH MEASUREMENT DATA (
	valor Double,
	isValid Boolean
) WITH SPATIAL GROUP Administrative (
	Section
) WITH SPATIAL GROUP Voronoi (
	Voronoi
) WITH CATEGORICAL GROUP (
	Magnitud RANGE MagnitudRange
);
//WITH BBOX ([40.42, -3.7], 12);


// SENSORS
CREATE SENSOR TrafficObservation (
	interval: 300,
	geometry: Point
) WITH PROPERTIES (
	descripcion String,
	accesoAsociado Long,
	subarea Long,
	codCent String,
	nombre String
) WITH MEASUREMENT DATA (
	intensidad Double UNITS "veh/h" ICON "network_check",
	velocidad Double UNITS "km/h" ICON "speed",
	ocupacion Double UNITS "%" ICON "emoji_transportation"
) WITH SPATIAL GROUP Administrative (
	Section
) WITH SPATIAL GROUP Barrio (
	Barrio
);
//WITH BBOX ([40.42, -3.7], 12);

CREATE SENSORGROUP Grupo1 (
	QAObservation,
	TrafficObservation
);
